SEARCH
Package main

Class Invoker

java.lang.Object
main.Invoker
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceInvoker
Direct Known Subclasses:
InvokerCacheDecorator, InvokerChronometerDecorator
public class Invoker extends Object implements InterfaceInvoker
Represents an invoker that can execute a list of actions. It manages memory usage, execution, and provides support for asynchronous execution using CompletableFuture.

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    Field
    Description
